notes.title: Data Availability
notes.p: Data on zebra location, movement and individual farm abundance in the Western Cape Province cannot be shared publicly because of confidentiality requirements of the data sharing agreement. CapeNature ( www.capenature.co.za) can be contacted for assistance with the relevant research application for researchers who meet the criteria for access to confidential data. For further details on the application and data access, please contact CapeNature at permits.fax@capenature.co.za or, by phone, at 021-483 0118 / 0121. Researchers are also welcome to contact the authors to provide guidance with this process. Data used in this study was extracted from the Western Cape Game Distribution Database, restricting the Taxon_name field to includes the item ‘Equus’. Spatial area size was extracted from the Polygon_code field within the dataset. Minimum data required include the holdingcode, latitude, longitude, census and holdingsize.
